About

Greetings! My name is Matthew Angel. I am Software Engineer with a passion for all things creative and tech-based. My goal is to bring creative solutions to the world through programming and development. I would love to go over some ideas, tech, or just have a nice conversation with you, so please do no hesite to reach out!

Services

User Experience

The user's having a smooth interaction is a top priority. The communication between the user and the software must be purposeful, yet engaging.

Responsive Design

Always creating with a responsive first approach, to accomodate all types of users on all types of devices.

Web Development

Take ideas and designs and turn them into fully functioning web apps through cleanly written semantic code.
